<?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:transform xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0" xmlns:cdr="cips.nci.nih.gov/cdr"> <xsl:output method="xml" omit-xml-declaration="no"/>
<xsl:template match="*"> <xsl:copy-of select="*"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:template>
<!-- =================================================================== Order citation lists by refidx ==================================================================== -->
<xsl:template match = "CitationWrapper">
<xsl:for-each select = "CitationLink"> <xsl:sort select = "@refidx" order = "ascending"/> <xsl:copy-of select = "."/> </xsl:for-each>
</xsl:template>
<!-- =================================================================== Template rule used to do XML to XML transformations which copies any attribute node, or node that is child of of something ==================================================================== -->
<xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:apply-templates/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template>
</xsl:transform>
